mapper.insert: insert into BACS_NOTICE (NOTICENUM, NOTICETITLE, NOTICECONTENTS,USERID) values (BACS_NOTICE_SEQ.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContents}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: delete from BACS_NOTICE where USERID = #{userId} and NOTICENUM = #{noticeNum}
mapper.update: update BACS_NOTICE set NOTICECONTENTS = #{noticeContents} , NOTICETITLE = #{noticeTitle} where NOTICENUM = #{noticeNum} and USERID = #{userId}
mapper.select: select NOTICENUM, NOTICETITLE, NOTICECONTENTS from BACS_NOTICE where NOTICENUM = #{noticeNum}
